section: THIS JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") made and entered into this 20th day of Friday, March 2020 (the "Execution Date"),
explanation: The text includes both the day of the week ('Friday') and the full date ('March 20, 2020').  This is structurally flawed because the day of the week might not correspond to the date.  If March 20, 2020, was not a Friday, this creates ambiguity. While not a huge legal issue, it demonstrates poor drafting and potential for misunderstanding, necessitating clarification or correction. While this error does not by itself create any in-text legal contradictions or conflicts under state or federal law that could cause issues of ambiguity in legal terms, the incorrect date can bring up issues in legal terms.

section:
Member Duties Description
BorrowMoney.com, inc *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal
JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD To be paid within 90 days of signing this agreement. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: This table outlines the duties of each member. For BorrowMoney.com, inc., the description is unclear and grammatically incorrect ('HTML code...employees/personal'). This lacks clarity. More significantly, *there is no clearly defined remedy if BorrowMoney.com fails to meet these vaguely defined obligations.* The contract needs to specify consequences for non-performance of these technical duties. Similarly, the phrasing 'medical dispatch personal & product service as needed' is ambiguous. What is the scope of 'as needed'? Who determines the need? These points would lead to disputes.

section:
Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"):
Member Contribution Description Agreed Value
BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500,000.00 USD
JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD in cash. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: There is an inconsistency, because the revenue amount of JVLS, LLC contribution has been added to the 3,500,000 valuation of BorrowMoney.com, inc, bringing up legal issues to the actual distribution
